website_summaries.verdict: The Puma IGNITE Flash evoKNIT managed to meet the expectations of many consumers when it came to comfort and style. On the flipside, the lack of traction and arch support did not please some individuals. But in the end, it was considered a reasonably priced workout footwear because it was supportive, lightweight, and breathable.
pros: A vast majority of the owners lauded the comfortable footbed of the Puma IGNITE Flash evoKNIT
The stylish looks and colorways of the trainer were adored by a high number of testers
Plenty of wearers commented that the shoe was true to size and width
The lightweight nature of the footwear was appreciated by numerous users
Multiple consumers stated that the product offered great value for its price
Several gym-goers felt that the merchandise provided adequate support during workouts
The breathable upper was a welcomed feature, according to some reviewers
A handful of purchasers found this model easy to wear
cons: A minority of the buyers complained that the Puma IGNITE Flash evoKNIT lacked arch support
The cushioning was insufficient and caused heel pain for some people
A couple of training aficionados ranted that the outsole was not grippy

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Ignite Flash-Evoknit Competition Running Shoes
product_meta.description: All new ignite flash evoknit changes the game by offering evoknit technology at a commercial price-point. With fresh PUMA branding, this shoe caters to the bold, youthful consumer. The tooling features ignite in the heel, providing a lightweight, comfortable, and cushioned feel under the foot. Molded rubber heel clip is designed to secure the heel and caps off the finishing details.
